trans-unit.source: Hosts custom controls or Windows Forms controls.
trans-unit.target: 承载自定义控件或 Windows 窗体控件。

trans-unit.source: ToolStripControlHost is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripControlHost 是为的抽象基类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripControlHost can host other controls, including custom controls, in two ways: - Construct a ToolStripControlHost with a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripControlHost 可以托管其他控件，包括自定义控件，两种方式:-构造从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>派生的类与 ToolStripControlHost

trans-unit.source: To fully access the hosted control and properties, you must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A> property back to the actual class it represents.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全访问托管的控件和属性，必须强制转换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A>于实际的属性类它表示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Extend ToolStripControlHost, and in the inherited class's default constructor, call the base class constructor passing a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: -扩展 ToolStripControlHost，并在继承的类的默认构造函数调用基类构造函数并传递从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>派生的类

trans-unit.source: This option lets you wrap common control methods and properties for easy access in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 此选项允许你在一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>中包装用于轻松访问常见的控件方法和属性

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripControlHost class to host your customized controls or any other Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripControlHost 类用于承载自定义的控件或任何其他 Windows 窗体控件。

trans-unit.source: To customize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, derive from ToolStripControlHost and create a custom implementation.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、 派生自 ToolStripControlHost 并创建自定义实现。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: You can override methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A> to handle events raised by the hosted controls, and you can put custom functionality into properties to enhance the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 如重写方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A>来处理事件引发由托管的控件，并可以将自定义功能放入属性，以改善所承载的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class that hosts the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>承载指定的控件的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>承载此<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The control referred to by the c parameter is .
trans-unit.target: 引用控件 c 参数是 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class that hosts the specified control and that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>承载指定的控件并具有指定的名称的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>承载此<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，表示控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在控件中显示的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> ，表示要在控件背景中显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ImageLayout" name="ImageLayout" href=""></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中定义的背景图像布局<xref uid="langword_csharp_ImageLayout" name="ImageLayout" href=""></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>: - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (default) - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>
trans-unit.target: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>: - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> - <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (default) -<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以选中控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can be selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件可以选中，;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted control causes and raises validation events on other controls when the hosted control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值所承载的控件是否导致，并当托管的控件接收焦点时，会引发其他控件的验证事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted control causes and raises validation events on other controls when the hosted control receives focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果所承载的控件将导致和时在托管的控件接收焦点，则引发其他控件的验证事件否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> is hosting.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>此<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>承载。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> is hosting.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>此<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref>承载。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the control on the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体上控件的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Use the ControlAlign property to determine or define how hosted controls are to be laid out on the form.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ControlAlign 属性来确定或定义如何托管的控件要在窗体布局。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The ControlAlign property is set to a value that is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: ControlAlign 属性设置为一个值，不是一个<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的辅助功能对象，该控件。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultSize property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the control when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: DefaultSize 属性表示<xref:System.Drawing.Size>最初创建时的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A> is `true`, the control is sized automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> orientation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>是`true`，控件自动调整大小根据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>方向。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can manually adjust the size of the control by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A> property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以手动调整控件大小，通过设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>属性值设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 以便保持更好的性能，不应设置<xref:System.Drawing.Size>处于其构造函数的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the DefaultSize property.
trans-unit.target: 首选的方法是重写 DefaultSize 属性。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The display style of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的显示样式。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if double clicking is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了双击;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值控制是否父级的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>已启用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果父控件的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>启用; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 进入托管的控件时发生。

trans-unit.target: 将焦点给予某个控件。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件已经有输入焦点，则，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置托管控件要使用的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> for the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>托管控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置托管控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the foreground color of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>表示托管控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: 检索适合控件的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: 控件自定义大小的区域。

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 类型的有序的对<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>表示的宽度和高度的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnBoundsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnBoundsChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.target: 处理命令键。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果键已由项; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
